name: Smoother-Chat
author: Christian Muehlbauer

sections.description:
Smoother-Chat is probably the easiest plugin to add a ChatGPT based chat window to your WordPress site via shortcode.

There are only 3 steps to do:

  1. Add your OpenAI API Key in the Plugin settings (Create an account here at OpenAI and get your own API Key)
  2. Set how your chat should behave (“You are a helpful, knowledge sharing chatbot who is expert in DIY camper van teaching.”)
  3. Add the shortcode [smoother-chat] to any page that should have the chat window in the lower right corner
sections.faq:
Which GPT-model is used?

gpt-3.5-turbo

Is the plugin free?

Yes the plugin is free.
The current pricing for your OpenAI API-Key you can find at the Pricing site from OpenAI

Will there be more functions?

Yes it will. In addition to more free features, we are also working on a premium version. You can follow both activities here.
